1. Open Chrome browser
2. type this in your url box: 
chrome://extensions/
3. Switch developer mode on by clicking on upper right corner of Extensions page
4. Drag and drop the zip file
5. If it does not work, extract zip file and then, click on "Load unpacked" on extensions page and locate it to the extracted folder.

Configuring Extension:
1. Click on Extension icon on your browser
2. Pin this extensions
3. Then you will see a new icon on the left of your extension icon, click on that, enter input, save data.
4. Toggle switch must be on in order to fetch data.
